description: This file defines the InfinityReranker class, which integrates with the infinity_client API to perform document reranking based on relevance scores. It includes methods for synchronous and asynchronous reranking, URL parsing, and client management.

classes.name: InfinityReranker
classes.description: A reranker class that interfaces with the infinity_client API to perform relevance-based document reranking.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the InfinityReranker with optional URL, top_n, api_key, and other parameters.

methods.name: _parse_url
methods.description: Parses the provided URL to extract host and port information.

methods.name: base_url
methods.description: Constructs the base URL for the infinity server based on host and port.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Creates or retrieves the infinity client, handling authentication if api_key is provided.

methods.name: _rerank
methods.description: Performs the reranking of documents synchronously using the infinity_client API.

methods.name: rerank
methods.description: Public method to rerank documents synchronously, with error handling.

methods.name: arerank
methods.description: Asynchronous version of rerank, performing the same operation asynchronously.
